entry.title: Production in construction up by 1.2% in the euro area and by 1.3% in the EU
entry.summary: In November 2024, compared with October 2024, seasonally adjusted production in construction increased by 1.2% in the euro area and by 1.3% in the EU, according to first estimates from Eurostat, the statistical office of the European Union. In October 2024, production in construction grew by 0.8% in...

entry.title: Services production up by 0.3% in the euro area and by 0.5% in the EU
